website_summaries.verdict: The myriad of compliments received by the Puma King Allround Turf just proved the unbeatable quality of this shoe. Classic comfort, looks, fit, and durability were among the highlights of this exceptional turf trainer. There’s just one caveat; the cleat runs too large. But even that flaw was deemed to be an advantage for wide-footed players. From amateurs to professionals, this is one vintage turf cleat that is undeniably worth the buy; even soccer old-timers just can’t get enough of it.
pros: The Puma King Allround Turf is a highly recommended shoe by the majority of its users
Several wearers of the turf cleat have confirmed the noteworthy comfort it offers
A good number of wide-footed players were glad with the accommodating fit of the turf trainers
The overall fit of the turf trainer was well-received by many wearers
“Nice” was the most common word used by a lot of commenters when pertaining to the overall quality of the shoe
Some of the reviewers were avid fans of the soccer cleat’s classic look
A few players can attest that the leather upper of the King Allround Turf is best in producing powerful shots
The leather quality of the soccer cleat was perceived to be superb by a considerable number of users
The turf cleat lasted for several seasons without any durability issues as attested by a few players
A few testers were too pleased with the shoe’s overall quality that they had to buy more than one pair
Some commenters who introduced themselves as long-time soccer players have been constant wearers of the Puma King Allround Turf
A few of those who purchased the soccer cleat felt that it was a great value for money considering its affordable rate
cons: Many of the reviews brought up issues with the turf cleat being too large
Some users described the Puma King Allround TT to be clunky due to its bulky built
If not for its heavy weight, many players said they would have rated the shoe a five-star
One player felt that the soccer cleat was a bit difficult to put on and off
Some users of the Puma King Allround Turf did not like the stiff give of its upper material

customer_reviews.title: Classic football shoe for artificial pitches and must for wide feet or high arches
customer_reviews.text: Classic football shoe for artificial pitches. A must for anyone with wide feet or high arches. I wear 3/4 length arch supports and these are the only shoes I could find which allow a comfortable fit and playing experience. They are not the quickest of shoes and have a wide sole and fairly rigid sides so suit a more measured and considered style of play. I can still run around quite happily in them and the sides are a good soft leather which allows for movement of the foot and takes the pressure off the little toes. Highly recommended if any of the above is important to you.
customer_reviews.author: M. H

customer_reviews.title: Best footy boots I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to play over 60's walking footy on astro. Previous boots had no cushioning and were hard on the knees. Wore these and knees were fine. Support and cushioning brilliant. Find it hard to get 10.5 size to fit as have broad feet, but these fit like slippers. But pricey but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Parker

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: change the style of the puma king a lot. ive had them before and they were great, now, the tongue is different to them (even though they still show the old photo with the tongue as it used to be) the laces have already started to fray and i have only used them genuinely 4 times, they still have a good tread, like the old style and you dont slip but they have made them a lot heavier they used to be and after 15/20 mins of football on astro turf, you can certainly feel it. please bring back the old puma king and go back to the old design.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Heaven! Fantastic for those with wider feet!
customer_reviews.text: I Coach Football and I have big, wide feet (size 13) these fit beautifully and are very comfy, yes they are pricey but worth it. It was painful to wear Adidas and Nike as they are so narrow that my feet over hang the sole plate and in no time, my toes push the sides of the shoes out. These lasted me nearly 12 months... Which to be fair as nearly a miracle!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: wider than most
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wider fit trainer for astro turf walking football, I tried a pair of nike football trainers which were miles to tight, after reading reviews for puma king thought I would try these, they felt tight at first wearing them indoors to break them in a bit, when I wore them on the pitch I forgot they were new felt really comfortable, so for me they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: the trucker

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3G
customer_reviews.text: These boots are well made and they offer a bit more support around the ankle than some other astros which tend to be thin and a bit flimsy. The leather is top quality and supple. Feels expensive. Like other buyers, I’d say that these are a little wider than a standard size but I didn’t need to downsize to get a good fit. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Started breaking after two uses on Astroturf
customer_reviews.text: Both shoes have started coming apart at the top seam after only two uses. That is something I expect from a £20 pair of shoes you throw away after a couple months, not from a £80 pair. The shoe seems well designed otherwise, comfortable wear and light on the knees. But I cannot justify spending 4x the money relative to cheap shoes without a minimum of durability. UPDATED to 1 star since after 3 months the sole of the left shoe has completely split from the rest. I'm a moderate user (twice a week for 1 hour), expected better, cannot recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Leighton

customer_reviews.title: Great astro turf boots
customer_reviews.text: I used to always buy Nike Air because they had a wider fitting, however, they changed to a narrower fit. Puma Kings are great for wider feet. I'm a size 10, however, the ones that I received felt more like size 11's and I had to put insoles in. Even then they never felt tight enough. This is the downside of on-line ordering - you can't try before you buy. Just make sure you can easily return them. I will be buying another pair in future (i'll probably order a 9.5).
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of puma king for 10 years using them once and at most twice a week and decided to replace them in November last year. I have not had this pair for 12 months and the sole on the right shoe is becoming detached. There has been a clear deterioration in the quality of the product
customer_reviews.author: Danny O'D

customer_reviews.title: Need Extra Half Size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 9.5 as well, having seen feedback advice that you need a half size more than your usual shoe size (mine being 9). The size 9 were very tight, would never have given enough to feel right. The 9.5 pair fitted well. (This was wearing my relatively thin new footie socks.) They have felt really comfy from the first game (on parched grass), with good support which I need having gone over on both ankles of late and having a fallen arch. I need generous width as well, which these give. The leather is thick and supple. I am glad I paid the extra for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Williams

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Control
customer_reviews.text: I have been an Adidas wearer for 30 years for trainers for football, however recent years they seem to have shrunk and lost the padding within their shoes. These Puma's on the other hand, have the width and length as required and fell sturdy under foot. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Capk69

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot and I wish it fitted but it is far too narrow for my foot. I need a wide fit astroturf football boot and this one just does not fit my foot. If anybody has found a wide turf trainer please let me know! They sell them in the USA, why not here????
customer_reviews.author: MRM London

customer_reviews.title: Best astro shoe I have played in over the years
customer_reviews.text: Best astro shoe I have played in over the years. i have had 5 pairs. very good fitting, quilted and cushioned instep and toes for passing, striking and griping the ball (to spin and curl). good ankle support and heel cushion. only use on astro - like any shoe, sole has good cleats and grip. Be warned soles do wear down quicker if you use as fashion shoe or indoor football or not exclusively on astro turf.
customer_reviews.author: peter leecho

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: After one use the sole has started to come away from one of the shoes. I'm pushing 40, so I didn't exactly give them a hard time. It's a shame because I was happy with them on first impressions: fairly comfortable, good fit for a wide foot, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Panthro

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for my son's big feet
customer_reviews.text: My son has huge feet and trying to find appropriate footwear is a real challenge. These not only fit in length but also have appropriate width so just right.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Danby

customer_reviews.title: Solid comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt some of the best 5-a-side boots around. Very comfy and felt more protecting than others I've used in the past. Mine lasted just over 2 years and I play on average 5-6 times a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slipped at the back
customer_reviews.text: One of the shoe tongues was much smaller than the other and the shoes slipped at the back so had to send back
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Best Astro trainers about
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and comfortable to play in. Shame the Calcetto ones disappeared a few years ago, which were even better, but these are the best around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality boot
customer_reviews.text: Good quality boot, found it preforms well with grip on both astroturf and 3g surfaces. Have found this shoe much more comfortable than the likes of adidas and nike ones which have used thinner material and seem suited better for slim profile feet
customer_reviews.author: RossK

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, loads of support
customer_reviews.text: 3rd pair of Puma King astro boots, each pair have lasted at least 5yrs with 2 to 3 times use every week. Always fit perfectly, comfortable, loads of support. Would never buy anything else..!! PUMA, please don't ever stop making this model of shoe..!!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Maden

customer_reviews.title: Great all round football boots
customer_reviews.text: My husband asked for these for Xmas but they were sold out everywhere. I ordered off snap& they were delivered the next day, fantastic. He loves them old skool pumas.
customer_reviews.author: Cfuse

customer_reviews.title: Puma Kings, quality as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great football trainers, fit well and good quality as expected from Puma Kings. Delivered on time and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.S.Mott

customer_reviews.title: Puma Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Bigger fit than I expected so needed to buy thicker socks. Strong comfy and durable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Mr K T McGovern

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets
customer_reviews.text: These are just too comfortable, I've used them on astro and firm ground, they are absolutely superb, in my humble opinion, look no further, definitely worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: The best astro turf trainer you can buy, for a wide fit.
customer_reviews.text: The best astro turf trainer you can buy, for a wide fitting. I've used these for the past 15 years and they've never let me down and always performed. They may not be the lightest but they protect and support your foot well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Wide fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly Most football trainers are very narrow it seems these days I know not why but these are are not just wish they did an indoor version
customer_reviews.author: sparty cus

customer_reviews.title: Feels like runners!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not kidding. Having tried only 30-50e Astro boots those boots feels just like regular runners. There is no sign of that hard heel feeling. Really happy with that purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lotocki

customer_reviews.title: Quality trainers
customer_reviews.text: had a few pairs of these now,and while not as good as the old German made boots are probably still the best quality football trainers available
customer_reviews.author: S. C. Charles

customer_reviews.title: The King of Trainers!
customer_reviews.text: These are just great, a classic trainer, good on grass and indoor. Hard wearing, not cheap but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Newman

customer_reviews.title: Truly Trainer Royalty
customer_reviews.text: Through experience of previously purchasing Adidas and Puma footwear I knew to err on one size larger than I actually am,however found that these were still very snug so could have gone another half size further but it’s good to see that there are still some leather uppers out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I am huge fan of these trainers as they are extremely smart and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kieran Newey

customer_reviews.title: Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a relative he is very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to books

customer_reviews.title: good classic
customer_reviews.text: good classic trainer however the size 9 are snug if you like them that way then cool but i prefer a bit of space but still a well made boot that works and is made well. will buy again and again
customer_reviews.author: dippa

customer_reviews.title: Not kangaroo leather any more?
customer_reviews.text: The leather is not as soft as the last pair - used to be kangaroo leather for Puma King?
customer_reviews.author: Ian Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Puma trainers
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought the same pair in America, he said " they are the most comfortable trainer ever"
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and amazing grip on AstroTurf. Highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: The most important thing is finding a brand that fits your feet - these are perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Only ever buy these now - reliable and last a long time. The most important thing is finding a brand that fits your feet - these are perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tip top
customer_reviews.text: My third pair over about 15 years for 5's. Really like them but I'm unfortunately still pretty average but no boot is going to change that
customer_reviews.author: Peeterman

customer_reviews.title: Puma Kings Rule!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these boots three times now. A little pricey but my preferred astro boot.
customer_reviews.author: JUDE BUTTLE

customer_reviews.title: No football boots / trainers beat Puma King!
customer_reviews.text: Always been a fan of Puma King for over 20 years now. They never let me down with their quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Mr MP Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of these for don’t know how many years, just replaced them - still the best in the business
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. R. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: fit fantastic but part of the sole on heal broke off ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these 5 years ago, fit fantastic but part of the sole on heal broke off after 2 months. I decided to have a look again and saw the sole had a re-design. Crossed fingers these last & do the job. Great quality...
customer_reviews.author: Pjmr

customer_reviews.title: Never disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Classic astro trainers, been wearing this make for as long as I can remember, and that's a few years! Never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnyscotsman

customer_reviews.title: Magic boots
customer_reviews.text: A great pair of astro turf football trainers. 3rd pair
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Wide fit
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are a wide fit, and great for Any one that struggles with small foot bed.
customer_reviews.author: Londonirish

customer_reviews.title: Great football trainers
customer_reviews.text: Well made very comfortable just how I remember Kings from my serious playing days. Great grip on 3g
customer_reviews.author: bloke

customer_reviews.title: I choose these as I bought a similar pair back ...
customer_reviews.text: I choose these as I bought a similar pair back in the early 2000s. I have long narrow feat so they perfectly. If they last for another 15+ years they should see out my 5-a-side a career.
customer_reviews.author: matt watson

customer_reviews.title: great fit and at a very good price
customer_reviews.text: Top quality, great fit and at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Derek Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best astro turf football trainers you can get. Grip, control, comfort, fantastic. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: richard lewis

customer_reviews.title: 5* for Astro
customer_reviews.text: Other half very happy. He's says playing in these is just another level and can't be beaten. Happy chap!
customer_reviews.author: Deb G

customer_reviews.title: Good job
customer_reviews.text: I hope these last as long as the last pair I had.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cool trainers
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these trainers, I need them for coaching on astro turf. Really comfy on the feet and look good too.
customer_reviews.author: Steve of Southwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been playing in the same boots for over 10 years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: Good pair of boots. Great grip on 3G surfaces even in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, gripping fitting boot
customer_reviews.text: I got these a year and a half ago, but I did have to replace them shortly after as the stitching failed. But, the replacement pair have done really well. They provide great grip on the turf while playing footy. I am a size 10 and sometimes a 11, and these fit me perfectly! Really happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Rudd Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Puma King
customer_reviews.text: They came promptly. They are comfortable and sturdy. I would recommend them. I use them twice weekly and they have been perfect so far.. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Cruyff, Maradona, Pele... and me...
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for Cruyff, Maradona and Pele. Probably just about good enough for me to trudge around a 5-a-side pitch... I struggle with having wide feet and these are the first boots I've had that didn't pinch. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: grumpinho

customer_reviews.title: ' They have the classic Puma look and are both comfortable and hard wearing
customer_reviews.text: These have always been my astroturf, and hard ground, shoe 'of choice.' They have the classic Puma look and are both comfortable and hard wearing. The 'feel' of the shoe is also good when striking a ball, and the pimpled sole grips both rubber and sand based astro turf surfaces equally well.
customer_reviews.author: ian l j breeze

customer_reviews.title: these trainers have tremendous grip
customer_reviews.text: Nice Astro turf trainers my only fault with em that is they can slip on slippery surface other than there perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JAMMIE

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other Uk size 12, these boots seem small.
customer_reviews.author: Simon D

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: They fit a little bigger than my other football shoes, but they look great and durable. Good delivery, packaging, looks just like in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As good as ever
customer_reviews.text: Always buy Puma King. Will do so again when this pair are worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Tooting Q

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality but excellent customer service to replace!
customer_reviews.text: Bought in February, comfortable but used only 8 times then upper separated from the sole quite badly. Amazon replaced immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Branwell Bronte

customer_reviews.title: Always extremely comfortable and very durable
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Puma Trainers for both indoor/3G outdoor football and training. Always extremely comfortable and very durable. I had my last pair for 7 years and just purchased these 6 weeks ago. They were more expensive but you can feel the quality it these trainers. Comfort is 2nd to none and fits like a glove. I would expect to have these for a good few years. Would highly recommend them to anyone. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: declan small

customer_reviews.title: puma king allround astroturf.trainers
customer_reviews.text: firstly it was delivered next day very good ,my husband is over the moon .. Thank you so much guys for the £5 off another pair and a packet of sweets :) my husband want a pair for his birthday 13th of this month ..so happy because we had a good deal xxx and always there to talk too .xx
customer_reviews.author: pooski

customer_reviews.title: What A Great Pair - How AstroTurf Boots Should Be
customer_reviews.text: Treated myself to a pair of these bad boys. You know what you get with Puma Kings & I was not disappointed. Fitted perfectly. Just enough padding to feel the ball yet protect your feet. I've played a couple of times a week for about 6 months wearing these & they don't look like they are about to let me down any time soon. Brilliant boots.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's King Allround Tt Football Shoes
product_meta.description: Professional football shoe for use on hard natural surfaces and artificial turf. Combines Puma cell utmost cushioning and Puma lite leather for consistent comfort.
feature_bullets: Fine leather - for added ball control.
Sole with CELL shock absorption. Gently cushions your steps. Also goes easy on the joints.
Outer sole with EverRide. Additional shock absorption. For every step.
With PUMA formstrip and PUMA No. 1 logo.
